Factsheet

Developer:
Orange Helicopter
Based in Cornwall, UK
Release date:
Platforms:
Android (out now)
iOS (coming soon)
Website:
blobjam.com
Regular Price:
Free (with ads and IAP)

Description

A modern twist on classic bubble popping gameplay! Shoot the blobs to match 3 of the same colour and pop them. Blobjam has realistic physics, so aim carefully -- those blobs have a habit of squidging around in ways you don't expect.

History

Blobjam is Orange Helicopter's first game. What started out as a happy childhood memory of Puzzle Bobble, an experiment with OpenGL shaders and a desire to use Box2D physics for something eventually transformed into a full game. It's called Blobjam because I had toast and jam for breakfast that morning, and Blobtoast would be a stupid name.

Features

  • Endless match-3 gameplay with realistic physics.
  • Compare scores with your Facebook friends and the rest of the world.
  • Collect falling coins and use them to buy power-ups.
  • Complete missions to earn more coins.
  • Free-to-play, supported by ads and optional in-app purchases of coins.

About Orange Helicopter

Boilerplate
Orange Helicopter is a one-man games studio, founded by former game AI researcher Ed Powley, and based in York, UK.
